Command *find*
***************

Documentation for the find command in */trans/cmds/find.c*.

Command
=======

See: :doc:`Command: locate <locate>` :doc:`Command: grep <grep>` 

USAGE
  ``find <pattern> <files>``

Display lines containing match to specified target pattern, within specified files.
